title: GG Allin Best of 1991 Live DVD remux
description:
***********************************
*  GG Allin & The Murder Junkies  *
*              â€”                  *
*  Raw, Brutal, Rough & Bloody    *
*              â€”                  *
*  The Best of 1991 DVD remux     *
***********************************

After spending 19 months in the Adrian, MI Correctional Facility, GG Allin was paroled in March 1991.
Back in NYC, the Murder Junkies were ready to carry out GG's Rock & Roll Mission.
In the Fall, GG Allin & The Murder Junkies set out on their first US Tour.
See for yourself why GG Allin will always be the undisputed leader of the scumfuc Rock & Roll underground.

This is the remux of the original DVD, that means NOTHING WAS RE-ENCODED.

I removed the 5.1 audio track, since it was the same practically mono recording as in the 2.0 track but with inferior quality.
Also removed fragments with his mother's speech, so here's only the "real meat", split by files:

01 - San Diego 27_9_91.mkv
02 - Chicago 10_10_91.mkv
03 - Atlanta 20_11_91.mkv

Specs:
  Video: MPEG-2 720*480 59.94 FPS interlaced
  Audio: AC3 48kHz 192kb/s
